attributes.action: Save any British Industry infra-structure from break up
attributes.additional_details:
NOT awarding contracts to companies outside Britain until after the result of the in/out referendum on Europe.

Government contracts to be awarded only to British tax paying companies working within Britain currently working on, investing in, or bidding for future contracts, thus ensuring continuity of employment for British workers until after the in/out referendum.

To have contracts which then go 'off shore' in the run up to the referendum will only harm industry - rebuilding from scratch is not an option.
